analysis.key_quote: DO NOT PASS THE PROPOSED 'SCHEDULE F' RULE. It will not improve the quality of employee or work output, but will only contribute to the horrible "leadership" and decisions already occurring under trump with his highly unqualified cabinet.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing that employment should be based on qualifications and merit rather than loyalty, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
